name: Chipotle Honey Vinaigrette -- Copycat Recipe
description: Here's an easy recipe to mimic the awesome Chipotle Honey Vinaigrette from Chipotle Mexican Grill.  It has a sweet, smoky flavor that'll make your salad sing!
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups oil (olive or any neutral oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for heat and sweetness, adding additional chipotles and honey if you want.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste for heat and sweetness, adding additional chipotles and honey if you want.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately.  Store in an airtight container in the fridge where it will keep for at least a few days.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately.  Store in an airtight container in the fridge where it will keep for at least a few days.
